contents.item: To be laughed at draws more profitable attention than being smiled at
contents.owner: Agona Apell, The Success Genome Unravelled: Turning Men from Rot to Rock

contents.item: You don't become a success by breaking the rules. You don't become a success by obeying the rules. You become a success by inventing the rules.
The three-part whats to winning: 1. What you have. 2. What you need.3. What you believe.
This is certainly one of the best ways to ensure failure. Make excuses, don't take action!
contents.owner: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

contents.item: Burning bridges is much easier than making them and bridges take you places!
contents.owner: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

contents.item: People you associate with or choose to deal with are the most important people who will shape your destiny.
contents.owner: Abhishek Ratna, No Parking. No Halt. Success Non Stop!

contents.item: When you succeed, you become the professor of the world
contents.owner: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

contents.item: Success is not a romantic word, it's an ugly world.
contents.owner: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

contents.item: Success is not a luxury. It's a must. Succeed or die
contents.owner: Bangambiki Habyarimana, The Great Pearl of Wisdom

contents.item: Never look back on yesterday’s success
Success is like a seed, it waits for the right conditions that will allow it to grow.
To succeed means you to sail across some difficult courses.
Becoming successful is a rough journey that carries pain and requires perseverance.
Your belief in yourself, is the Secret to Achieving anything you want.
contents.owner: Auliq Ice, The Secret of Greatness

contents.item: You are always freed by your lucid knowledge and acceptance of your tasks.
Every desire has it's own demand and a price to pay.
Just don't be afraid to be who you are and you will be successful.
It doesn't matter what you did, all what matters is what you want to do, when, where and how you are going to do it.
Dare to dream and toil to achieve.
Success by one’s efforts is the achievement gained through ability, not through deception.
